titleStmt.title: Remarks upon the petition and petitioners against the Lord Mayor and Court of Aldermen of London December, 1690.

notesStmt.note: "A reply to the petition To the honourable the knights, citizens and burgesses ... the humble petition of the members of the Common Council, London, 1690, concerning the liberties and franchises of the city of London"--NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
